QueenMod:QueensBanner.NAME: Queen's Banner
QueenMod:QueensBanner.FLAVOR: As long as the banner remains, the nation will never die.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first event of every act is a Hive Event.

QueenMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

QueenMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
QueenMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

QueenMod:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

QueenMod:HoneyJar.NAME: Honey Jar
QueenMod:HoneyJar.FLAVOR: A hereto unknown technology allowing the long term storage of nectar. Remarkable.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b5 #yqueenmod:Nectar.

QueenMod:Medal.NAME: Medal of Honor
QueenMod:Medal.FLAVOR: Some troops will distinguish themselves on the battlefield, and fight not for money, but for their nation and their pride.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yHornets and #yBumblebees in your hand cost 0.

QueenMod:DraftNotice.NAME: Draft Notice
QueenMod:DraftNotice.FLAVOR: One of the perks of eusocial societies: no draft dodgers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add #b3 #yDrones to your draw pile. (Drones are 0-cost skills that draw 2 cards and exhaust.)

QueenMod:BloatedManual.NAME: Bloated Manual
QueenMod:BloatedManual.FLAVOR: I assure you, every bit of information is essential.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, draw a card for every #b20 cards in your draw pile.
